content:
ToolStripPanelRow Class

In this Article

Represents a row of a ToolStripPanel that can contain controls.

Syntax

Declaration

[System.ComponentModel.ToolboxItem(false)]
public class ToolStripPanelRow : System.ComponentModel.Component, IDisposable

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • MarshalByRefObject
  • System.ComponentModel.Component
  • ToolStripPanelRow

Constructors summary

ToolStripPanelRow(ToolStripPanel)

Initializes a new instance of the ToolStripPanelRow class, specifying the containing ToolStripPanel.

Properties summary

Bounds

Gets the size and location of the ToolStripPanelRow, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.
Controls

Gets the controls in the ToolStripPanelRow.
DefaultMargin

Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.
DefaultPadding

Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.
DisplayRectangle

Gets the display area of the control.
LayoutEngine

Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.
Margin

Gets or sets the space between controls.
Orientation

Gets the layout direction of the ToolStripPanelRow relative to its containing ToolStripPanel.
Padding

Gets or sets padding within the control.
ToolStripPanel

Gets the ToolStripPanel that contains the ToolStripPanelRow.

Methods summary

CanMove(ToolStrip)

Gets or sets a value indicating whether a ToolStrip can be dragged and dropped into a ToolStripPanelRow.
Dispose(Boolean)

Releases the unmanaged resources used by the ToolStripPanelRow and optionally releases the managed resources.
OnBoundsChanged(Rectangle,Rectangle)

Occurs when the stem.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds* property changes.
OnControlAdded(Control,Int32)

Raises the ControlAdded event.
OnControlRemoved(Control,Int32)

Raises the ControlRemoved event.
OnLayout(LayoutEventArgs)

Raises the Layout event.
OnOrientationChanged()

Occurs when the value of the stem.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation* property changes.

Constructors

  • ToolStripPanelRow(ToolStripPanel)

    Initializes a new instance of the ToolStripPanelRow class, specifying the containing ToolStripPanel.

    public ToolStripPanelRow (System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel parent);

    Parameters

    • parent
      ToolStripPanel

      The containing ToolStripPanel.

Properties

  • Bounds

    Gets the size and location of the ToolStripPanelRow, including its nonclient elements, in pixels, relative to the parent control.

    public System.Drawing.Rectangle Bounds { get; }

    Property Value

    • Rectangle

      A Rectangle representing the size and location.

    Remarks

    While the DisplayRectangle property gets only the client elements of the control, the Bounds property gets the nonclient and client elements.

  • Controls

    Gets the controls in the ToolStripPanelRow.

    public System.Windows.Forms.Control[] Controls { get; }

    Property Value

    • Control[]

      An array of controls.

  • DefaultMargin

    Gets the space, in pixels, that is specified by default between controls.

    protected virtual System.Windows.Forms.Padding DefaultMargin { get; }

    Property Value

    • Padding

      A Padding that represents the default space between controls.

  • DefaultPadding

    Gets the internal spacing, in pixels, of the contents of a control.

    protected virtual System.Windows.Forms.Padding DefaultPadding { get; }

    Property Value

    • Padding

      A Padding that represents the internal spacing of the contents of a control.

  • DisplayRectangle

    Gets the display area of the control.

    public System.Drawing.Rectangle DisplayRectangle { get; }

    Property Value

    • Rectangle

      A Rectangle representing the size and location.

    Remarks

    While the Bounds property gets the nonclient and client elements, the DisplayRectangle property gets only the client elements of the control.

  • LayoutEngine

    Gets an instance of the control's layout engine.

    public System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine LayoutEngine { get; }

    Property Value

    • LayoutEngine

      The LayoutEngine for the control's contents.

  • Margin

    Gets or sets the space between controls.

    public System.Windows.Forms.Padding Margin { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Padding

      A Padding representing the space between controls.

  • Orientation

    Gets the layout direction of the ToolStripPanelRow relative to its containing ToolStripPanel.

    public System.Windows.Forms.Orientation Orientation { get; }

    Property Value

    • Orientation

      One of the Orientation values.

  • Padding

    Gets or sets padding within the control.

    public virtual System.Windows.Forms.Padding Padding { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Padding

      A Padding representing the control's internal spacing characteristics.

  • ToolStripPanel

    Gets the ToolStripPanel that contains the ToolStripPanelRow.

    public System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel ToolStripPanel { get; }

    Property Value

    • ToolStripPanel

      The ToolStripPanel that contains the ToolStripPanelRow.

Methods

  • CanMove(ToolStrip)

    Gets or sets a value indicating whether a ToolStrip can be dragged and dropped into a ToolStripPanelRow.

    public bool CanMove (System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip toolStripToDrag);

    Parameters

    • toolStripToDrag
      ToolStrip

      The ToolStrip to be dragged and dropped into the ToolStripPanelRow.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if there is enough space in the ToolStripPanelRow to receive the ToolStrip; otherwise, false.

  • Dispose(Boolean)

    Releases the unmanaged resources used by the ToolStripPanelRow and optionally releases the managed resources.

    protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);

    Parameters

    • disposing
      Boolean

      true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

    Remarks

    This method is called by the public Dispose method and the Finalize method. Dispose invokes the protected Dispose(Boolean) method with the disposing parameter set to true. Finalize invokes Dispose with disposing set to false.

    When the disposing parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this ToolStripPanelRow references. This method invokes the Dispose method of each referenced object.

  • OnBoundsChanged(Rectangle,Rectangle)

    Occurs when the stem.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds* property changes.

    protected void OnBoundsChanged (System.Drawing.Rectangle oldBounds, System.Drawing.Rectangle newBounds);

    Parameters

    • oldBounds
      Rectangle

      The original value of the stem.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds* property.

    • newBounds
      Rectangle

      The new value of the stem.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Bounds* property.

    Remarks

    Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. For more information, see Events.

    The OnBoundsChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

  • OnControlAdded(Control,Int32)

    Raises the ControlAdded event.

    protected virtual void OnControlAdded (System.Windows.Forms.Control control, int index);

    Parameters

    • control
      Control

      The control that was added to the ToolStripPanelRow.

    • index
      Int32

      The zero-based index representing the position of the added control.

    Remarks

    Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. For more information, see Events.

    The OnControlAdded method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

  • OnControlRemoved(Control,Int32)

    Raises the ControlRemoved event.

    protected virtual void OnControlRemoved (System.Windows.Forms.Control control, int index);

    Parameters

    • control
      Control

      The control that was removed from the ToolStripPanelRow.

    • index
      Int32

      The zero-based index representing the position of the removed control.

    Remarks

    Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. For more information, see Events.

    The OnControlRemoved method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

  • OnLayout(LayoutEventArgs)

    Raises the Layout event.

    protected virtual void OnLayout (System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs e);

    Parameters

    • e
      LayoutEventArgs

      A LayoutEventArgs that contains the event data.

    Remarks

    Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. For more information, see Events.

    The OnLayout method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

  • OnOrientationChanged()

    Occurs when the value of the stem.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRow.Orientation* property changes.

    protected virtual void OnOrientationChanged ();

    Remarks

    Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. For more information, see Events.

    The OnOrientationChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
